artist: Frank Lloyd Wright John W. Ayers
creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Sheldon Sturgis
image_copyright: © Frank Lloyd Wright Foundation %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
text: Definitely not designed for comfort, this chair’s back instead showcases a particularly beautiful piece of oak, quarter-sawn across the grain to highlight the wood’s flame-like patterns. Other ornament is minimal, just a bit of trim at the top rail and along the sides of the back legs.
title: Side chair
